title: 피그마 시안 히어로 — 분할 레이아웃 + YouTube (v_proposal_11)
description: 피그마 원안대로 히어로 구현: 연보라(#f1f2ff) 배경 + 좌측 텍스트(그라디언트 타이틀) + 우측 YouTube 영상(라운드 30px). 일시정지/음소거 컨트롤, 프로그레스바(01─03), 이전/다음 화살표. 나머지 섹션(혁신방향 수평타임라인, Field캠퍼스, 성과 카드, 뉴스, FAQ)은 v_proposal_10 동일.

title: 수평 타임라인 + 피그마 성과 카드 (v_proposal_10)
description: 혁신방향을 수평 타임라인(Noda-style)으로 재구현: 스크롤 기반 도트 이동, 배경 크로스페이드, 마지막 도트에서 스티키 해제. Core Achievements를 피그마 시안대로 YouTube 영상 카드 3장(15,000+/2,000억+/7,000+) + 다크 배경. 히어로 YouTube 영상 3종 + 분절 프로그레스바.

title: 인터랙션 프리뷰 — YouTube 영상 히어로 (v_proposal_09)
description: v_proposal_08 기반. 히어로를 원안 YouTube 영상 3종(연합전공 수강생 / 통합산단 매출액 / 외국인 유학생 유치 실적)으로 교체. 슬라이드 전환 시 영상별 네이밍 라벨이 페이드 전환됨. 나머지 섹션 동일.

title: 피드백 인터랙션 프리뷰 (v_proposal_08)
description: 배포 사이트 피드백 기반 인터랙션 프리뷰. 헤더 스크롤 전환, 히어로 슬라이드쇼+프로그레스바, Innovation Strategy 스티키+스냅 스크롤(데스크톱)/캐러셀(모바일), Field Campus 탭+지도 핀+스크롤 전환, Core Achievements 보라배경+카운트업, Glocal Now 스크롤스냅 뉴스카드, FAQ 아코디언. Tailwind CDN + SUIT + Vanilla JS.

title: 교과과정 카뱅네비 + 카드 디자인 (sub_page_21)
description: 카카오뱅크 스타일 플로팅 캡슐 서브네비 + 카드 디자인. 모듈별 독립 카드(둥근모서리+그림자), 카드 안에 학년별 과목. 6개 전공. 스크롤 시 네비 pill 색상 전환.

title: 교과과정 카뱅 플로팅네비 + 표 (sub_page_20)
description: 카카오뱅크 스타일 플로팅 캡슐 서브네비 + 표(테이블) 디자인. 6개 전공. 스크롤 시 네비 pill 색상이 전공별로 전환. 인디고 출발.

title: 교과과정 카카오뱅크 스타일 (sub_page_19)
description: 풀페이지 스크롤 + 스티키 서브네비. 6개 전공 (수소에너지/전략반도체/첨단콘텐츠/융합디자인/휴먼메타케어/헤리티지콘텐츠). 스크롤 시 네비 active 컬러가 전공별로 변화. 인디고 출발.

title: 교과과정 투톤 교차 (sub_page_18)
description: 탭 버전. 모듈 헤더 포인트 컬러 투톤 교차 (진/중 번갈아). 학년 라벨 포인트 컬러. 탭은 보라 유지. 끝 컬럼 불공평 없음.

title: 교과과정 C-Uniform (sub_page_17)
description: 탭 버전. 포인트 컬러 모듈 헤더 + 학년 라벨. 모든 컬럼 동일 색상 (그라데이션 없음). 탭은 보라 유지.

title: 교과과정 풀페이지 보라+포인트 (sub_page_16)
description: 풀페이지 스크롤 버전. 피그마처럼 4개 전공 모두 한 페이지에. 모듈 헤더 포인트 컬러 그라데이션 + 학년 라벨 포인트 컬러.

title: 교과과정 탭 보라+포인트 그라데이션 (sub_page_15)
description: 탭 버전. 모듈 헤더 포인트 컬러 진→연 그라데이션 + 학년 라벨 포인트 컬러. 탭은 보라 유지.

title: 교과과정 초기 (sub_page_14)
description: 교과과정표 초기 버전. 전공별 독립 컬러 테마 (틸/골드/블루틸/코랄). 탭 전환 시 전체 색상 변경.

title: Hybrid Tab Hub (v_sub_43)
description: Stacking scroll for intro (Hero + Vision) + Tab-based 8대 과제 hub. Solves content density by separating hierarchy: stacking for impact, tabs for browsing. Actual initiative content from source material.

title: Stacking Hybrid (v_sub_42)
description: v40 Color Mood + v41 Clean Structure. Rich colored backgrounds with clean card design, GSAP pin for overflow fix, subtle rounded corners. The balanced middle ground.

title: Clean Stacking (v_sub_41)
description: Figma-matched clean design. White/LightGray alternating backgrounds, flat section transitions, GSAP pin for overflow scroll. Institutional tone.

title: Color Stacking (v_sub_40)
description: Bold colored stacking sections (Dark/Purple/Navy/Green). CSS sticky with 48px rounded corners. Flashy marketing landing style.

title: Webzine Proposal 7 (Advanced Layouts)
description: More sophisticated layout options focusing on 'Art Direction'. D. Frame (Gallery Style), E. Vertical (Architectural), F. Floating Card (Invitation). Highly polished visual experiments.

title: Webzine Proposal 6 (Layout Study)
description: Typography & Image Layout Variations. Focusing on 'Bridging Local to Global'. 1. Center Classic (In-Image), 2. Split White (Out-Image), 3. Big Overlay (Magazine Cover). Find the best balance.

title: Webzine Proposal 5 (Radical)
description: Experimental Layouts. Features 3 radical concepts: 1. Split Slider (Dynamic Interaction), 2. Typography First (Big Text, No bg), 3. Bento Grid (Dashboard Style). A departure from traditional magazine layouts.

title: Webzine Proposal 4 (Design Switcher)
description: Interactive Design Lab. Features a 'Style Switcher' that lets you toggle between 3 Cover Story Layouts: A (Classic Left), B (Center Poster), and C (Modern Grid). Right panel remains fixed as requested.

title: Webzine Proposal 3 (Frameless Cover)
description: Full-screen Split Layout without a top header bar. Logo is integrated into the Cover Story (Left). Categories act as the main navigation on the Top Right. Highly immersive 'Magazine Cover' experience.

title: Webzine Proposal 2 (Immersive Cover)
description: Refined Proposal 1. Features a 2:1 Split Hero Section with Immersive Typography (Playfair Display) and a clean Side List for Top Stories. Replaces the grid layout with a focused magazine cover look.

title: Webzine Proposal 1 (JoongAng + Elle)
description: New Webzine concept proposal. Features a 'JoongAng Plus' style minimalist header (Hamburger Menu + Logo only) and an 'Elle' style split layout hero section (Left Typography / Right Image). Uses 'Journal' naming and Navy/Mint color scheme.

title: Final Sub-Special (v_sub_39)
description: Corrected Presentation Page. Restores 'Scroll Snap' for that polished feel. Fully localized Korean content. Adjusted layout (Breadcrumbs, Split Screen) to ensure it feels like a Sub-page, not a Main Landing.

title: The Ultimate Presentation (v_sub_38)
description: Solved Color & Layout Issues. Uses a consistent Light/Gray palette for 8 sections to ensure content flexibility. Integrates Horizontal Scroll, Right Dot Nav, and Mobile Sticky LNB. Practical and scalable.

title: Refined Stacking (v_sub_37)
description: Improved v14 Stacking. The first section is a static base, and subsequent sections slide up with rounded tops to create a 'Card Deck' effect. Solves the header overlap issue.

title: The Presenter (Example 13)
description: Special Landing Page. Combines 'Card Stacking' vertical scroll (squared edges) with a 'Horizontal Scroll' section. Features Right Dot Nav (Desktop) / Top Nav (Mobile). Light Theme Presentation vibe.

title: Content Modules (Example 12)
description: Modular Component Library. Extracts and organizes the structured content blocks from sub_page_08 (Accordions, Step Cards, Comparison Grids, Feature Boxes). A toolkit for building content-heavy pages.

title: The Perfect List (Example 11)
description: Responsive Board List. Matches the tone of sub_page_10. Features a Classic Table that elegantly transforms into a Card List on mobile devices. Refined pagination and search UI.

title: Board Detail View (Example 10)
description: Board Post View. The detail page for the Classic Table board. Features a structured metadata header, clean typography for reading, file attachment box, and prev/next navigation. Optimized for readability.

title: Text Board Variants (Example 9)
description: Text Board Proposals. Showcases 3 styles: 1. Classic Table (Dense/Official), 2. Card Row (Separated/Interactive), 3. Timeline List (Editorial/Date-focused). All match the Crisp & Solid theme.

title: Sticky LNB Layout (Example 8)
description: Stable Navigation Alternative. Solves the 'Double Capsule' visual conflict. The Section Navigation starts below the hero and 'Sticks' to the top on scroll. Professional, grounded, and distraction-free.

title: Bottom Nav Layout (Example 7)
description: Mobile-first Navigation Variant. Based on Example 6, but moves the section anchor links to a floating Bottom Navigation Bar (BNB). Keeps the header clean and accessible.

title: Content Structure Guide (Example 6)
description: Heavy Content Solution. organizes massive text information (Majors, Application, Systems) into user-friendly Accordions, Step Process Cards, and Comparison Grids. Perfect for the 'Field Major Guide' page.

title: Board Styles (Example 5)
description: Board Design Proposals. Showcases 3 distinct styles: 1. Clean List with Tabs (Notices), 2. Visual Grid (Events), 3. Horizontal Webzine List. All aligned with the Glocal Violet identity.

title: D-insight Webzine (Example 4)
description: Production Example: Digital Webzine. Scrollytelling format with Parallax Cover, Horizontal Scroll Articles, and Floating Motion elements. Maintains Glocal Violet identity while delivering an editorial experience.

title: Community & Support (Example 3)
description: Production Example: Notice Board & Inquiry. Uses v33 Rich List and v34 Crisp Forms. Clean layout without sidebar.

title: Curriculum & Track (Example 2)
description: Production Example: Education Roadmap. Uses v34 Crisp Table styles for course lists. Centered layout suitable for dense information.

title: About FIELD Campus (Example 1)
description: Production Example: Introduction Page. Uses v35 Visual Hero style. Immersive top image followed by structured grid content.

title: The Sidebar Layout (v_sub_36)
description: Content-heavy Layout. Features a sticky Sidebar Navigation (LNB) on the left and structured content on the right. Perfect for Curriculum, Regulations, or FAQ pages.

title: The Visual Hero (v_sub_35)
description: Visual Start Scenario. Replaces the text-only intro with an immersive background image Hero section (50% height). Features white text on dark visuals and a rounded connection to the content.

title: The Crisp Fix (v_sub_34)
description: Fixes blurry elements in v32. Inputs and Lists now have crisp borders (#cbd5e1) and darker text (#111) for perfect legibility, while maintaining the soft card aesthetic.

title: The Detail Polish (v_sub_33)
description: Content Density increased. 'Empty' lists and forms are now filled with rich UI elements (icons, avatars, toggles, file indicators). Keeps the clean background for readability.

title: The Perfect Glocal (v_sub_32)
description: The Final Converged Standard. v30's Soft Figma Visuals + Floating Capsule Header + v31's Rich Interactions. Improved text contrast and shadows for a solid yet airy feel.

title: The Solid Glocal (v_sub_31)
description: High Contrast & Rich Interaction. Solves 'faintness' with crisp borders and darker typography. Features lively micro-interactions (hover zoom, icon slide, active states).

title: The Glocal Refined (v_sub_30)
description: Final Polish of the Glocal System. Improved contrast (darker text, deeper shadows), fixed side margins (centered container), and optimized visual weight. Ready for production.

title: The Glocal System (v_sub_29)
description: The Ultimate Standard. Combines the structured components of 'Air System' (v27) with the 'Glocal Violet' visual identity (v28). Features soft shadows, 30px radius, violet accents, and functional sub-page layouts.

title: The Glocal Match (v_sub_28)
description: Perfect Figma Match. Adopts the specific Glocal Violet (#3e31d5) and Pale Tint (#f1f2ff) palette. Features soft shadow cards (no borders), large radii (30px), and a high-contrast deep blue section.

title: The Air System (v_sub_27)
description: Design System & Component Guide based on 'The Air Slim'. Includes Typography, Buttons, Count-up Animations, Photo Gallery, Notice Boards, and Accordions. A toolkit for building consistent sub-pages.

title: The Air Slim (v_sub_26)
description: Refined 'iPhone Air' Concept. Ultra-slim borders, generous whitespace, and organized grid layouts. Natural scrolling with a focus on content hierarchy and clarity.

title: The Air Scrollytelling (v_sub_25)
description: MacBook Air M3 Style. High-quality scrollytelling. Sticky sections, rhythmic typography, and 'Bento' feature grids. A polished, narrative-driven experience.

title: The Curriculum Finder (v_sub_24)
description: macOS Sequoia Style. Clean 'Window' layout with Sidebar Navigation. Structured List Views perfect for displaying complex Curriculum and Academic Roadmaps.

title: The Dashboard (v_sub_23)
description: CarPlay Style Web. Practical Dashboard Layout. Clean, high-contrast panels with rounded corners. Organized information density suitable for sub-pages.

title: The Ultra Titanium (v_sub_22)
description: Apple Watch Ultra Style (White Titanium). International Orange Accents, Rugged Modular Grid, and DIN-style Typography. Professional and Technical.

title: Spatial Vision OS (v_sub_21)
description: Apple Vision Pro Style. Immersive 'Spatial Computing' layout. Glass panels with depth, gaze-driven hover effects, and a sense of physical presence in a digital space.

title: The Air Light Mode (v_sub_20)
description: iPad Air Style. Colorful, playful, and bright. Big gradient typography, smooth scroll animations, and a focus on 'Lightness' and 'Creativity'.

title: The Pro White Mode (v_sub_19)
description: iPhone Pro Style (White). Titan Typography on Clean White. High-end, premium engineering vibe with Always-Visible Capsule Header.

title: The Glassy Professional (v_sub_18)
description: Premium Glassmorphism Design. Soft Aurora Gradient background with frosted glass cards. Clean, modern, and highly readable.

title: The Kinetic Layers (v_sub_17)
description: Experimental Layout using Mix-Blend-Mode. Typography overlaps images and changes color. Kinetic Marquee and Layered Reveal effects.

title: The Korean Smart Grid (v_sub_16)
description: Optimized for Korean Typography (SUIT, Word-break). Features Sticky Intro + Smart Grid Layout with immersive video hero.

title: The Art Gallery (v_sub_15)
description: Editorial Minimal Design. Features Split Layout (Pin & Slide), Horizontal Scroll for Curriculum, and refined typography. Understated elegance.

title: Color Stacking Scroll (v_sub_14)
description: Immersive 'Card Stacking' layout where each section has a distinct color theme (White -> Dark -> Blue). Always Floating Capsule Header included.

title: The Free-Flow Grid (v_sub_13)
description: Trendy Asymmetrical Layout. Always Floating Capsule Header. Zigzag Parallax Content. Background color transitions to Dark Mode on scroll.

title: True Floating Header (v_sub_12)
description: Sub-page implementation respecting the 'Floating Capsule Header' design (v41). Features layered hero section and independent tab navigation.

title: Integrated Header (v_sub_11)
description: Seamless Sub-page experience inheriting the Main Page's Context-Aware Floating Header logic. Features Smart Sticky LNB that attaches to header or top.

title: The Cinematic Scroll (v_sub_10)
description: Full-screen Scrollytelling with Sticky Text and Background Video changes. Maximizes immersion for introductory content.

title: The Bento Archive (v_sub_9)
description: Modern Bento Grid Layout. Modular blocks for Video, Stats, Images, and Links. High information density with trendy UI.

title: The Research Insight (v_sub_8)
description: Magazine & Dashboard Style Layout for Research/Business pages. Features Key Metrics Hero, Cluster Grid, and Project Slider.

title: Clean LNB (v_sub_7)
description: Removed redundant Floating Nav. Implemented 'Sticky Tab Bar' for Mobile and 'Side Dot Nav' for Desktop. Cleanest integration with 4th Draft Header.

title: The Stacking Experience (v_sub_6)
description: Trendy Card Stacking Scroll Layout. Bottom-fixed Floating Capsule Nav (like Arc/iOS). Split screen sticky interaction for immersive storytelling.

title: The Ultimate Standard (v_sub_5)
description: Combines the requested 'Round Floating Capsule Nav' with GSAP Scrollytelling. Features Parallax Hero, Horizontal Curriculum Scroll, and Bento Grid Facilities.

title: The Scroll Narrative (v_sub_4)
description: Interactive Scrollytelling Layout using GSAP. Features Horizontal Scroll Section, Typography Reveal, and Parallax Image effects. Highly immersive experience.

title: The Tech Dashboard (v_sub_3)
description: A completely new Sub-page Concept: Dark Mode Parallax Hero, Floating Capsule Nav (Auto-show), and Bento Grid Layout. Focused on 'Data' and 'Visual Immersion'.

title: Connected Field Campus Detail (v_sub_2)
description: Corrected Sub-page design matching the '4th Draft' and 'Color System'. Aligned Header, Fonts, and Rounded Card styles. Focus on Alliance Indigo identity.

title: Sub-Page Standard (v_sub_1)
description: Standard Sub-page Template featuring Sub-Hero, Sticky LNB, and Content Grid. Based on Main Page design DNA.

title: Peeking 3D Carousel (v76)
description: Reduced card width to 240px to show neighboring cards (Peeking). Gentle 3D Arc motion and opacity control for better scroll affordance.

title: 3D Ark Carousel (v75)
description: Removed FOCUS label. Applied 3D Arc Motion: cards rise from below and scale up as they approach the center. Seamless infinite loop.

title: Infinite Focus Loop (v74)
description: Perfect infinite looping carousel with snap scrolling. Cards snap exactly into the fixed focus frame. Seamless 'Clone' logic implemented.

title: Mobile Focus Carousel (v73)
description: Implemented 'Focus Snap Carousel' for mobile. Fixed purple border frame stays in center, cards slide behind it. Map pins sync with scroll.

title: Typo Tuned Map (v72)
description: Adjusted font weights (Semibold / ExtraBold / Regular) and card width to ensure one-line titles. Final Polish for Blueprint Style.

title: Final Blueprint (v71)
description: The Ultimate Combination: v70's Blueprint Card Design + v68's Forced Pulse Logic. Ensuring perfect visibility and style.

title: Blueprint Card Style (v70)
description: Implemented the requested Rounded Card Design: White background, Bold Blue Border, Full-height Image on left. Infinite Pulse restored.

title: Impact Pulse (v69)
description: Large scale, high-impact pulse animation that runs 4 times and stops. Perfect visibility and cleaner UX.

title: Pulse Animation Revival (v68)
description: Forced animation on pseudo-elements to ensure Pulse visibility. Simplified keyframes and layout fixes for consistent rendering.

title: Frameless HUD Fix (v67)
description: Fixed the 'Square Pulse' issue by using a pseudo-element with forced border-radius. Clean Frameless HUD style preserved.

title: Mobile Map Layouts (v66)
description: 3 Mobile-Specific Layouts for Map Interaction: Horizontal Swiper (Airbnb), Vertical Pull-up (Naver Map), Focus Context (Taxi App).

title: Square Card Gallery (v65)
description: 3 Styles of Square Image Cards: Polaroid (Vertical), Side-by-Side (Horizontal), and Overlay (Immersive). Modern and instagram-like layout.

title: Compact Glass Node (v64)
description: Smaller card size with Glassmorphism background to blend with the map. Brand blue accents for integration. Pulse effect retained.

title: Large Image Node (v63)
description: Expanded the thumbnail to a 16:9 Panoramic Card. Shows rich visual context on hover/tap. Suitable for building exteriors or lab interiors.

title: Living Glow Node (v62)
description: Initial State: Breathing Glow (box-shadow animation). Active State: Strong Static Glow + Line Expand + Card Reveal. Perfect visibility.

title: High-Visibility Pulse (v61)
description: Double Ring Pulse animation using real DOM elements to ensure visibility. Unified motion for desktop/mobile interaction.

title: Unified Motion (v60)
description: Identical animation for Desktop (Hover) & Mobile (Tap). Fixed Pulse visibility using real DOM elements. Responsive line length.

title: Final Polish (v59)
description: Perfect circular pulse using pseudo-elements. Cleaned up hover interaction with 'Rich Card' style (Thumbnail + Text). Optimized for both Desktop and Mobile.

title: Frameless HUD (v58)
description: Removed card box for a cleaner, HUD-like look. Stronger 'Pulse' animation. Text shadow for readability. Circle Bubble option.

title: Data-Specific Living Node (v57)
description: Implemented 'Double Pulse' animation for high visibility. Updated content to specific data: Category (e.g. 전력반도체), Name (e.g. 부산테크노파크), Location (e.g. 남구 감만동).

title: Refined Living Node (v56)
description: Simplified motion (One-time expand). Strong initial Pulse effect. Mobile-optimized tap interaction (Card Popover).

title: Tech-Architectural Node (v55)
description: Reimagined Connected Node with rectangular holographic frames instead of circles. Construction line animation and scan effects for a more professional, architectural feel.

title: Rich Living Node (v54)
description: Fixed Pulse animation with custom CSS. Added Rich Content (Thumbnail + Badge + Title) for both Desktop (Line Connect) and Mobile (Card Pop).

title: Living Node System (v53)
description: Unified 'Connected Node' system for both Desktop (Hover & Line) and Mobile (Tap & Morph/Bubble). Pulse animation for initial attention.

title: Universal Map Pin UI (v52)
description: 6 Map Pin designs that work seamlessly on both Desktop (Hover) and Mobile (Tap/Always Visible). Tag, Pill, Expandable, etc.

title: Mobile Connected Node (v51)
description: Adapted 'Connected Node' concept for mobile screens. 3 Prototypes: Touch & Connect, HUD Scroll Scanning, Vertical Flow Accordion.

title: Mobile Map UI Gallery (v50)
description: 10 Responsive solutions for map interaction on mobile devices. Bottom Sheet, Floating Swiper, Full Modal, etc. simulated in phone mockups.

title: Connected Node 10 (v49)
description: 10 variations of 'Connected Node' interaction. Line-based, Bubble Pop, Region Glow, etc. Focusing on minimal tech vibe.

title: Connected Node UI (v48)
description: A unique, fancy interaction where info lines expand from dots on hover. No box cards, just connected typography and lines. Sci-fi/Tech vibe.

title: Brand Widgets (v47)
description: Re-colored 6 interactive widgets using the official brand palette (Primary #4132CC, Mint #00BEB5). Perfectly tailored for Glocal University.

title: Interactive Widgets (v46)
description: 6 High-end card styles focusing on 'Clickability' and 'Micro-interaction'. iOS Widget, Dynamic Island, Drawer, Glass Overlay, Folder, Neon Border.

title: 12 Card Styles Fixed (v45)
description: Correctly displayed 12 card styles on a map background. Only Category, Photo, Title included. Clean & Fancy variations.

title: Brand Card Gallery (v44)
description: 12 Card variations tailored to the Glocal University brand theme (Deep Blue #3E31D5, SUIT Font). Ranging from Clean/Professional to Modern/Glass.

title: Card Design Gallery (v43)
description: A gallery of 12 distinct card design styles: Classic, Glassmorphism, Neumorphism, Minimal, Dark Mode, Brutalism, and more. Visual reference for selection.

title: Solid Card Styles (v42)
description: Non-glassmorphism card options: Floating Tile (Clean White), Minimal Border (Brutalism), and Dark Accent (Night Mode).

title: Card Styles (v41)
description: Card Style Playground: Frosty Glass vs Dark Onyx vs Neon Aurora. Interactive Map pins showcase 3 different glassmorphism card designs.

title: Interactive Map (v40)
description: Replaced Strategy text section with an Interactive Map featuring Glassmorphism cards (Figma Option 2 style).

title: Clean Text Link (v39)
description: Removed Compass Icon. 'Student Success Center' is now a clean, bold text link. Preserved v37's refined layout and v31's interaction.

title: Compass Icon (v38)
description: Final Polish: Added Compass Icon to 'Student Success Center' link. Preserved v37's refined layout and typography.

title: v31 Refined (v37)
description: Restored v31's stable layout. Improved typography (leading-relaxed). Aligned body content with header width (1400px).

title: Ultimate Fix (v36)
description: Solved Full Screen Expand issue by using absolute positioning based on window center. Improved typography with wider leading.

title: Fix Expand & Typo (v35)
description: Fixed video full-screen expand issue by moving video outside layout container. Improved main text typography (leading). 1920px Centered Layout.

title: Overflowing Hero & 1920 Layout (v34)
description: Max-width 1920px centralized layout. Hero video overflows to the right (off-canvas) for dynamic entry. Context-aware header preserved.

title: The Masterpiece (v33)
description: Combines v31's Context-Aware Header with v32's Layout Alignment. Floating Header hides on video, shows on content. Content aligns perfectly with Header width.

title: Final Content Polish (v32)
description: Updated Main Copy (Vision 2030). Aligned Desktop Content width (1400px) with Header for grid consistency. Cinematic Expand preserved.

title: Context-Aware Cinematic Header (v31)
description: Header disappears during the immersive video section (Scroll Down) and reappears when content starts (or user scrolls to very top). Perfect balance of immersion and usability.

title: Floating Cinematic Header (v30)
description: Rounded Floating Header design with Cinematic Hide/Show logic. Hides on scroll/expand for immersion, reappears on demand.

title: Cinematic Header & Giant Hero (v29)
description: Initial Video size increased (70vw/75vh). Header hides on scroll down/expand for immersion, shows on scroll up/content. Perfect blend.

title: Floating Smart Header (v28)
description: App-like floating header that hides on scroll down and shows on scroll up. Clean Expand layout preserved.

title: Solid Header & Big Hero (v27)
description: Always Solid White Header for stability. Cool Gray background with larger initial video (70vh). Polished split expansion.

title: Perfect Full Screen Expand (v26)
description: Fixed layout. Video breaks out of container to cover 100vw/100vh edge-to-edge on scroll. Immersive experience.

title: Clean Expand & Cool Gray (v25)
description: Background: #F5F5F7 (Cool Gray). Removed dots. Initial video size increased (70vw). Perfect centered expansion.

title: True Full Screen Expand (v24)
description: Fixed layout issue. Video now expands to cover the entire screen (100vw/100vh) edge-to-edge on scroll. Immersive experience.

title: Polished Split Expand (v23)
description: Perfected Split-to-Full interaction. Center-aligned video expansion, background dot pattern, and tighter layout for wide screens.

title: Split Expand & Tight Layout (v22)
description: Initial Left Text / Right Video layout that expands to Full Screen Video on scroll. Tighter container for WHD monitors.

title: Expand to Full & Tight Layout (v21)
description: Starts with Floating Rounded Video -> Expands to Full Screen on Scroll. Tighter container for WHD monitors.

title: Reverse Expand (Full to Split)
description: Start with Full-screen Video -> Scroll to shrink into Floating Card + Split Text. Apple TV+ style interaction. Mobile-optimized.

title: Apple TV+ Style Split (v19)
description: Initial split layout (Left Text / Right Video) that expands to full-screen video with overlay text on scroll. Immersive storytelling.

title: White Expand Hero (v18)
description: White background. Rounded video box expands on scroll (Apple/Toss style). Mobile video optimized with portrait aspect ratio.

title: Intro Story & Mobile Split (v17)
description: Desktop: Intro Text -> Video Reveal interaction. Mobile: Top Video / Bottom Text split layout to prevent cropping. Optimized UX.

title: Floating Video Layout (Final)
description: Desktop Hero video floats with padding and scales down on scroll (Apple style). Mobile video fits screen height.

title: Text Link Polish (v15)
description: Replaced 'Student Success Icon' with explicit text link + arrow for clarity. Most user-friendly for public institutions.

title: Graduation Cap Icon (v14)
description: Replaced Student Success Center icon with a clean 'Graduation Cap' symbol. Most intuitive and academic look.

title: Final Icon Polish & Details (v13)
description: Replaced 'User' icon with 'Compass/Puzzle' for Student Success Center. Refined tooltip and finishing touches.

title: Royal Edition (Lakers Gold Point)
description: Premium feel with Deep Lakers Gold (#FDB927) accent color. Adjusted for a more authoritative and luxurious look.

title: Brand Point & Detail Polish (v11)
description: Added Yellow Dot (.) to D-insight logo for branding. Refined color harmony with yellow accents.

title: Digital Network & More Stories (v10)
description: Added 'Digital Network' Section 3 with particle canvas & count-up data. Expanded Dinsight with 5 cards + View More link.

title: Neon Future (Dark Mode Color System)
description: Bold Dark Theme with Electric Indigo & Neon Mint gradients. Glassmorphism UI and futuristic vibes.

title: Apple Vertical Sticky & Clean Cards (v8)
description: Full-screen Vertical Sticky Scrolling (Image Background + Text Overlay). Clean 'Image Top / Text Bottom' cards for Dinsight. NEWSLETTER typo update.

title: Apple Horizontal Scroll (Dinsight)
description: Added Apple-style horizontal snap scrolling news section with large cards and zoom hover effects. Dark mode Dinsight area.

title: Kakao Interactive Scroll (v6)
description: True Sticky Interaction with Text Morphing & Progress Indicator. Deep Parallax and seamless transitions.

title: Clean Minimal & Sticky (v5)
description: Text-free Cinematic Hero, Student Success Icon Tooltip, Real Kakao-style Sticky Scrolling.

title: Kakao Style Header & Visual
description: Refined Sticky Header (Transparent -> White), Slideshow Hero with interview photos, Typographic Dinsight icon.

title: Cinematic & Interactive (Kakao Style)
description: Featuring real site photos, sticky scrolling interactions, and cinematic hero section.

title: Glocal Hybrid Theme (2.0)
description: Enhanced design with Glassmorphism, Cinematic Hero, Bento Grid, and Masonry Layout.

title: Initial Prototype (Figma)
description: Faithful implementation of the original Figma design using Tailwind CSS.
